localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Current drawdowns from highs:

TSLA -30%

CRM -26%

AAPL -15%

AMZN -14%

NFLX -13%

Yet the S&P 500 just hit its 15th new all-time high of the year

Remember when big tech was the only thing propping up the market?

Not anymore https://t.co/vnZipH2NP9
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
目前从高位缩减。

TSLA -30%

CRM -26%

AAPL -15%

AMZN -14%

NFLX -13%

然而，S&P 500指数刚刚创下今年第15个历史新高。

还记得大科技是唯一支撑市场的东西吗？

现在不一样了https://t.co/vnZipH2NP9

目前從高位縮減。

TSLA -30%

CRM -26%

AAPL -15%

AMZN -14%

NFLX -13%

然而，S&P 500指數剛剛創下今年第15個歷史新高。

還記得大科技是唯一支撐市場的東西嗎？

現在不一樣了https://t.co/vnZipH2NP9
